summary: A mellow drama following the moral decline of a housewife turned bank employee who embezzles a fortune from her customers and indulges in an affair with a younger man. Set in 1994, shortly after the burst of Japan's economic bubble.
cast: Rie Miyazawa|Sôsuke Ikematsu|Yûko Ôshima|Seiichi Tanabe|Yoshimasa Kondô|Renji Ishibashi|Satomi Kobayashi|Juri Ihata|Mayumi Tenkô|Hiroko Terada
title: Kami no tsuki
